title: IELTS Speaking 3: Historic Place | Địa điểm lịch sử

json.text: Hi guys! Welcome back to my channel!
This is Trang and I am back with  another IELTS speaking topic
again this videos is another sample of
how to expand your answer in  part 3 of the IELTS speaking test
which I've only talked about in my previous video
so basically, you can give reasons or examples  to support your opinions
you can speculate and talk about possibilities
when you're not sure about the information
or you can discuss the other side of the argument
and when you got a difficult topic that you don't like
or you don't have many ideas to talk about
you can try to use filler phrases
or make something up
so if you're ready, let's do this!
Okay that's all the questions about the topic:  Historic Place
I hope this topic wasn't too boring like it sounded
but I do believe that
that's the end of the video
I hope it was helpful
I will see you next time. Bye!
